jbb.engine.pacman
Class PacDot

java.lang.Object
  jbb.engine.Tile
      jbb.engine.Item
          jbb.engine.pacman.PacDot

public class PacDot
extends Item

The PacDot provides points for PacMan, and if it is additionally a PowerPellet, it grants PacMan invulnerability for 10 turns.

Author:
Jonathan Gravel

pickedUp

public void pickedUp(Avatar picker)
If the PacDot is picked up, it provides points to PacMan. If it also a PowerPellet, it grants invulnerability.
